Articles.Content:
Hi there. I have been a long time lover of KSP, and first of all wish to congratulate all you folks at Squad for making such a great game. Thank you for all your effort it is truly appreciated.

My question is as an avid Kerbal fan I was wondering if there was any way to purchase multiple keys for the product at a discount? I do not mean to imply that a discount is needed for such great work, but also know that Squad takes very good care of their community. So much so that I thought I'd look for someone else that has asked or mentioned this. I ran a few searches with a couple different keywords and did not have any luck citing it. So my apologies if its here and I missed it.

Again I love the game and the idea behind it. Myself and my children have gotten many hours of entertainment, and even some education along the way from the single copy I do own. With literally no sign of boredom in continuing to add hours every week.  I would like to spread that experience around a bit. I just thought if I could maximize the potential for spreading the love so to say it was worth a few minutes of searching and then typing for sure. I do not believe in any way I could qualify for the educational avenue (Though three of the science teachers (middle and high school) at my local school have shown interest, and that will be the first three I send out as they have received permission to move forward with this on the computers at the school) as many people I have in mind as folks that would enjoy it are in no way related to education, and some have even have turned game playing into a profession (i.e. twitch/youtube personalities). I look forward to hearing your response, and thank you in advance for taking a min to respond.

Hello @xxApvxx, welcome the forums!

As a single player game (though multiplayer is planned), Squad has never offered a discount for multiple purchases by individuals, and is unlikely to do so.

However, there are frequent discounts of 25% and 40% off the sale price on the Squad store and at all of the online retailers who offer KSP (GoG, Steam, etc).

My advice in your situation would be to keep an eye out for the sales.
Thank you for the fast response and the information. Should have bought more in the beginning I suppose. I'll give a shout back to the folks and let them know they are on their own.
